sentences.sentence: Cage changed his name to deflect accusations of nepotism.
sentences.translation: 凯奇改了名字以转移裙带关系的指责。

sentences.sentence: Many will regard his appointment as the kind of nepotism the banking industry ought to avoid.
sentences.translation: 很多人都把对他的任命看作银行业应当避免的裙带关系式操作。

sentences.sentence: With Frank's father the West Ham first team coach, sections of the support there cried nepotism.
sentences.translation: 随着弗兰克的父亲在西汉姆出任一队教练，在那里所得到的支持部分继续着他的理想。
